name: LiveLoop
overview: LiveLoop enables real-time document collaboration within the familiar enterprise desktop environment. LiveLoop’s first product is both a PowerPoint plugin and a hosted service that together enable PowerPoint users to work with each other on the same document at the same time. Instead of emailing dozens of attachments back and forth, LiveLoop users can edit their documents at any time, seeing their colleagues’ edits in true keystroke-by-keystroke real time.
